name: heatkeys
description: Web application for visualizing the frequency of key usage on the keyboard as a heat map. Supports Russian and English layouts.

scripts.copy-assets: copy src\styles.css docs\styles.css && copy src\index.html docs\index.html
scripts.prebuild: if exist docs rmdir /S /Q docs && mkdir docs
scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-locales && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-config
scripts.start: npm run build && cd docs && http-server -c-1
scripts.build:gh-pages: npm run build && type nul > docs\.nojekyll && type nul > .nojekyll
